yams.processor
Class Processor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--yams.processor.Processor
public class Processor
extends java.lang.Object

The overall processor class. Creates and initialises processor components such as the memory, registers and instruction decoder. Provides access to the managers also.

Author:
sw00
